name: Slaying Grove
description:
Slaying Grove!

• You need to escape the weird forest you woke up in! You do not know where you are or what you are against but you know one thing, you need to SURVIVE! Escape the forest trying to find your way through the hordes of creatures! 

• What is that? A paramedic helicopter? Finally, you can be saved. You need to arrive at the landing zone in order to be saved by the paramedics, but they are not here to stay! You need to HURRY! 

• You have 10 minutes to arrive at the destination! Hope you don't run in any obstacles!
